dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6294 IH: Veterans Earned Education Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Crow (for himself and Mr. Wilson of South Carolina) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to expand the set of individuals eligible to transfer Post-9/11 educational assistance to eligible dependents.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Veterans Earned Education Act.

section.header: Expansion of eligibility to transfer Post-9/11 educational assistance to eligible dependents
section.text: Section 3319(b) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking member of the uniformed services and inserting individual; and
by striking , has completed at least;
by inserting has completed at least before six years; and

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2), by inserting has completed at least before the years;
by redesignating paragraph (2) as paragraph (4); and
by inserting, after paragraph (1), the following new paragraphs:
has completed at least 17 years of service in the Armed Forces;
is retired from the Armed Forces under chapter 61 of title 10; or
